meanings.definition: A person who engages in analogies.
meanings.sent1: The analogists in the class enjoy comparing different things.
meanings.sent2: The analogists at the workshop shared interesting comparisons.
meanings.sent3: The analogists joked about comparing apples to oranges.
meanings.sent4: She was a master analogist, always finding connections between unrelated topics.
meanings.sent5: The analogists painted vivid pictures with their analogies.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who study and create analogies.
meanings.sent1: The team of analogists worked together to craft meaningful comparisons.
meanings.sent2: The analogists gathered to discuss their latest analogy projects.
meanings.sent3: The analogists organized a competition to see who could come up with the most creative analogy.
meanings.sent4: Their group was like a family of analogists, always supporting each other's work.
meanings.sent5: The analogists' room was filled with colorful charts and diagrams of their analogies.
